$description:
| What does this do? | Enables Azure AD Identity Protection sign-in risk policies |
| Why should you use this? | Configures a policy to detect sign-in risks, ensuring that suspicious sign-ins are challenged for multi-factor authentication. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users with suspicious login activity will be challenged for MFA. |
| Learn more | [Identity protection MFA policy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/identity-protection/howto-identity-protection-configure-mfa-policy) |
$friendlyName: Baseline - Require MFA for Risky Sign-ins
